query:
UPDATE http_monitors SET 
                status = $1,
                next_ping_at = $2, 
                status_counter = $3,
                error_kind = $4,
                last_http_code = $5,
                last_ping_at = now(),
                first_ping_at = coalesce(first_ping_at, now()),
                last_status_change_at = $6
            WHERE organization_id = $7 and id = $8
